item.title: 架构设计-分布文件存储-GlusterFS4.0-部署安装（1）
item.description: GlusterFS4.0部署 OS: Debian stretch Ver: GlusterFS 4.0 –> glusterfs-client 4.0 不支持 jessie.但兼容旧版本连接 必须不得小于2个节点 本次环境 系统节点： IP 别名 Brick 192.168.10.242 gnode1 /storage/vdb/CTI_DISK1 /storage/vdc/CTI_DISK3 /storage/vdd/CTI_DISK5 192.168.10.244 gnode2 /storage/sdb1/CTI_DISK2 /storage/sdc1/CTI_DISK4 /storage/sdd1/CTI_DISK6 客户端为：test-dev IP 别名 192.168.10.30 test-dev 1. 配置源安装 配置源： Add the GPG key to apt: # wget -O - https://download.gluster.org/pub/gluster/glusterfs/4.0/rsa.pub | apt-key add - # wget -O - https://download.gluster.org/pub/gluster/glusterfs/3.13/rsa.pub | apt-key add - <--客户端不支持jessie,
